Beserk looked annoyed being back in his cell. He paced back and 
forth, glaring at Techy and Sky Knight coldy. Even through the thick 
plexi-glass window, they could hear him snarling. He bared his white 
teeth at them while he was at it.

Techy stared in concern. She tried to give him a confident look. The 
only time he stayed in his cell was when he slept. He didn't like it 
when the scientists put him in it for tests.

"It's all right Beserk," Techy said to him. "Power down."

Beserk groaned, his teeth still bared. He began to calm down. Techy 
stepped closer to the plex-glass. "We want you to do something," she 
said to him. "We want you to show us how well you fight. Can you do 
that?" Beserk squinted at her.

Sky Knight looked to his far side. "Blazer! Wanna do something with 
those drones?"
